mapper.select: SELECT A.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INQUIRYFILE WHERE INQUIRYNO = A.INQUIRYNO) FILECOUNT FROM INQUIRY A ORDER BY UPLOADDATE DESC, INQUIRYNO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY (INQUIRYNO, MEMBERID, INQUIRYTYPENO, INQUIRYTITLE, INQUIRYCONTENT, UPLOADDATE ) VALUES (INQUIRYSEQ.NEXTVAL,#{memberId}, #{inquiryTypeNo}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, DEFAULT)

SELECT INQUIRYSEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO INQUIRYFILE(INQUIRYFILENO, INQUIRYNO, INQUIRYANSWERNO, INQUIRYFILENAME, RENAMEFILENAME, MEMBERID) VALUES (INQUIRYFILESEQ.NEXTVAL, #{inquiryNo},null, #{inquiryFilename}, #{renameFilename},NULL)

INSERT INTO INQUIRYANSWER (INQUIRYANSWERNO, INQUIRYNO,INQUIRYANSWERCONTENT, UPLOADDATE, MEMBERID ,INQUIRYANSWERTITLE) VALUES (INQUIRYANSWERSEQ.NEXTVAL,#{inquiryNo}, #{inquiryAnswerContent}, DEFAULT, #{memberId}, #{inquiryAnswerTitle})

SELECT INQUIRYANSWERSEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO INQUIRYANSWERFILE(inquiryAnswerFileNO, INQUIRYFILENAME, RENAMEFILENAME,MEMBERID,INQUIRYANSWERNO) VALUES (INQUIRYANSWERFILESEQ.NEXTVAL, #{inquiryFilename}, #{renameFilename}, #{memberId}, #{inquiryAnswerNo})
